paper_abstract: PROSA tries to simulate the evolution of human relationships from simple acquaintance to friendship and partnership. Our target is to obtain a self-reconfiguring P2P system which possesses some of the desirable features of social communities. We show that PROSA naturally evolves into a small-world network, with an high clustering coefficient and a relly short average path length.
paper_title: Self-organisation of resources in PROSA P2P network
